import React, { useState } from "react"; import shape01 from "../../assets/img/banner/banner_shape011.png"; import shape02 from "../../assets/img/banner/banner_shape033.png"; import shape03 from "../../assets/img/banner/banner_shape033.png"; import fireIcon from "../../assets/img/banner/fire.png"; import CountDownOne from "../CountDown/CountDownOne"; const Banner = (props) => { return (

  • Pre Sell
  • Soft Cap
  • Bonus

65% target raised 1 MATIC= 1000 IDT

Token sale status..

); }; export default Banner;
